comment:
* When a {@link View} implements this interface it will receive callbacks * when expanded or collapsed as an action view alongside the optional, * app-specified callbacks to {@link OnActionExpandListener}. * *

See {@link MenuItem} for more information about action views. * See {@link android.app.ActionBar} for more information about the action bar.

methods.name: public void onActionViewExpanded()
methods.comment:
* Called when this view is expanded as an action view.
     * See {@link MenuItem#expandActionView()}.

methods.name: public void onActionViewCollapsed()
methods.comment:
* Called when this view is collapsed as an action view.
     * See {@link MenuItem#collapseActionView()}.
